item.title: Passenger Address System (Courier/ Supernumerary Address System) – Cabin Speakers

remarks.para: No Courier/Supernumerary, cabin attendant seat or crew rest area bunk may be occupied from which the Passenger Address system is not audible and intelligible or that seat must be blocked and placarded DO NOT OCCUPY.

placard.para: Placard near Captain’s Audio Selector panel "CABIN SPEAKERS INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Placard appropriate Courier/Supernumerary seat, cabin attendant seat or crew rest area bunk "DO NOT OCCUPY".
